Package com.atakmap.android.gui.drawable

Class CheckBoxDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.atakmap.android.gui.drawable.ThreeStateDrawable
        • com.atakmap.android.gui.drawable.CheckBoxDrawable
  • public class CheckBoxDrawable
extends ThreeStateDrawable
    3 state checkbox icon used by Overlay Manager

    Plugins should use this class when implementing their own custom row layouts in Overlay Manager
